name: docker-publish
description: Publish Docker images to Docker Hub or other registries

examples.description: Publish specific version to Docker Hub

options.description: Additional tag for the image (can be used multiple times)
Push all tags of the repository
Skip image signing (default: enabled if configured)
List repositories in your Docker Hub account
Show what would be published without doing it
Force push even if image exists

registry_examples: GitHub Container Registry - dpublish myapp --registry ghcr.io

troubleshooting.solution: Build the image first with dbuild
Use buildx and create builder instance
troubleshooting.command: docker buildx create --use && dpublish myapp --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64
